LanguageData.SilverTile.label: silver tile
LanguageData.SilverTile.description: Expensive and slow to build. Soft grey tiles with a grey bordering. Beauty: 8.
LanguageData.SterileTile.label: sterile tile
LanguageData.SterileTile.description: Sterile tiles are clean, light grey squares. Very useful in hospitals to help prevent infections. Quite slow to build. Beauty: 0.
LanguageData.MetalTile.label: white metal tile
LanguageData.MetalTile.description: White metal square tiles, for that spaceship look. Beauty: 4.
LanguageData.MetalTileTwo.label: black metal tile
LanguageData.MetalTileTwo.description: Black metal square tiles, for that spaceship look. Beauty: 4.
LanguageData.MetalTileThree.label: grey metal tile
LanguageData.MetalTileThree.description: Square grey metal tiles with thin borders. Beauty: 4.
LanguageData.MetalTileFour.label: patterned metal tile
LanguageData.MetalTileFour.description: Grey metal tiles with fancy patterns. Beauty: 4.
LanguageData.GoldTile.label: gold tile
LanguageData.GoldTile.description: Gold tiles, because you're worth it. Beauty: 5.
LanguageData.GoldSolid.label: solid gold
LanguageData.GoldSolid.description: Solid gold, because you're wasteful. Beauty: 10.
LanguageData.PlateCopperBar.label: Copper plates
LanguageData.PlateCopperBar.description: Metal plates complete with rivets for an industrial look. Time-consuming to make, but easy to keep clean. Beauty: 2.
